segment.source: Troubleshooting DaRT 10
segment.target: Troubleshooting DaRT 10

segment.source: Troubleshooting DaRT 10
segment.target: Troubleshooting DaRT 10

segment.source: Troubleshooting DaRT 10
segment.target: Troubleshooting DaRT 10

segment.source: Troubleshooting content is not included in the Administrator’s Guide for this product.
segment.target: Troubleshooting content is not included in the Administrator’s Guide for this product.

segment.source: Instead, you can find troubleshooting information for this product on the TechNet Wiki.
segment.target: Instead, you can find troubleshooting information for this product on the TechNet Wiki.

segment.source: How to find troubleshooting content
segment.target: How to find troubleshooting content

segment.source: You can use the following information to find troubleshooting or additional technical content for this product.
segment.target: You can use the following information to find troubleshooting or additional technical content for this product.

segment.source: Search the MDOP documentation
segment.target: Search the MDOP documentation

segment.source: The first step to find help content in the Administrator’s Guide is to search the MDOP documentation on TechNet.
segment.target: The first step to find help content in the Administrator’s Guide is to search the MDOP documentation on TechNet.

segment.source: After you search the MDOP documentation, your next step would be to search the troubleshooting information for the product in the TechNet Wiki.
segment.target: After you search the MDOP documentation, your next step would be to search the troubleshooting information for the product in the TechNet Wiki.

segment.source: To search the MDOP product documentation
segment.target: To search the MDOP product documentation

segment.source: Use a web browser to navigate to the MDOP Information Experience TechNet home page.
segment.target: Use a web browser to navigate to the MDOP Information Experience TechNet home page.

segment.source: Enter applicable search terms in the Search TechNet with Bing search box at the top of the MDOP Information Experience home page.
segment.target: Enter applicable search terms in the Search TechNet with Bing search box at the top of the MDOP Information Experience home page.

segment.source: Review the search results for assistance.
segment.target: Review the search results for assistance.

segment.source: To search the TechNet wiki
segment.target: To search the TechNet wiki

segment.source: Use a web browser to navigate to the TechNet Wiki home page.
segment.target: Use a web browser to navigate to the TechNet Wiki home page.

segment.source: Enter applicable search terms in the Search TechNet Wiki search box on the TechNet Wiki home page.
segment.target: Enter applicable search terms in the Search TechNet Wiki search box on the TechNet Wiki home page.

segment.source: Review the search results for assistance.
segment.target: Review the search results for assistance.

segment.source: How to create a troubleshooting article
segment.target: How to create a troubleshooting article

segment.source: If you have a troubleshooting tip or a best practice to share that is not already included in the MDOP OnlineHelp or TechNet Wiki, you can create your own TechNet Wiki articles.
segment.target: If you have a troubleshooting tip or a best practice to share that is not already included in the MDOP OnlineHelp or TechNet Wiki, you can create your own TechNet Wiki articles.

segment.source: To create a TechNet Wiki troubleshooting or best practices article
segment.target: To create a TechNet Wiki troubleshooting or best practices article

segment.source: Use a web browser to navigate to the TechNet Wiki home page.
segment.target: Use a web browser to navigate to the TechNet Wiki home page.

segment.source: Log in with your Windows Live ID.
segment.target: Log in with your Windows Live ID.

segment.source: Review the Getting Started section to learn the basics of the TechNet Wiki and its articles.
segment.target: Review the Getting Started section to learn the basics of the TechNet Wiki and its articles.

segment.source: Select Post an article at the bottom of the Getting Started section.
segment.target: Select Post an article at the bottom of the Getting Started section.

segment.source: On the Wiki article Add Page page, select Insert Template from the toolbar, select the troubleshooting article template (Troubleshooting.html), and then click Insert.
segment.target: On the Wiki article Add Page page, select Insert Template from the toolbar, select the troubleshooting article template (Troubleshooting.html), and then click Insert.

segment.source: Be sure to give the article a descriptive title and then overwrite the template information as needed to create your troubleshooting or best practice article.
segment.target: Be sure to give the article a descriptive title and then overwrite the template information as needed to create your troubleshooting or best practice article.

segment.source: After you review your article, be sure to include a tag that is named Troubleshooting and another for the product name.
segment.target: After you review your article, be sure to include a tag that is named Troubleshooting and another for the product name.

segment.source: This helps others to find your content.
segment.target: This helps others to find your content.

segment.source: Click Save to publish the article to the TechNet Wiki.
segment.target: Click Save to publish the article to the TechNet Wiki.
